title: Olympics Officials Signal Sanctions on Russia in Sports May End
summary_full: In Milan this week, Olympics officials signaled a willingness to ease years of restrictions imposed on the country over its state-backed doping program and invasion of Ukraine.
summary_public: In Milan this week, Olympics officials signaled a willingness to ease years of restrictions imposed on the country over its state-backed doping program and invasion of Ukraine.

IT.label: neutral
IT.evidence: Olympics Officials Signal Sanctions on Russia in Sports May End
